content.value:
Located 1.6 kms far from downtown. Near to Unico mall, Americano mall, La Asuncion Hospital, and several big avenues.

Family triple rooms with private bathrooms. 4 to 6 beds for each sharing room, with private bathrooms.

La Quinta Bacana Hostal Conditions and Policies:

Cancellation policy: 24h before arrival.

Check in from 14:00.
Check out before 12:00.

Payment upon arrival by cash.

Taxes included.
Breakfast not included - 10.000 COP per person per day.

General:
Reception open from 24 hour.
No curfew.
The maximum period of stay is of 14 days.

description.description: La Quinta Bacana Hostal is located in Barranquilla, Colombia, with a very friendly and family environment with people from all around the world. We offer comfortable single and double beds for special rates. Located near to malls, big avenues and several supermarkets. Come to Barranquilla and join us, you’ll have the best of your vacations in La Quinta Bacana. Here everything is more Bacano!
